name: Picnic Pandemonium
description:
A first person game where you must find the items listed in the notebook and throw them into the back of the truck to get to the picnic. Score is calculated based on the time taken to find the items.

WASD to move

TAB to show / hide notebook

'E' to pickup and throw items

Escape for in game menu

As it is, the map where you must defend your newly assembled picnic from insects is not included. The map will be added in an update soon™ .
